contest-event.event-date: July 12, 1947 D Durham League Contest (Section C) Durham League Contest (Section C) 30 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-c The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow.
